metadata.description: How aligned your career drives and professional goals are

astrological_basis.what_it_measures: Mars shows drive and competitive energy. Saturn shows long-term career building. Jupiter shows growth aspirations.

planet_meanings.Saturn: long-term career building and professional discipline
planet_meanings.Jupiter: growth aspirations and where you aim high

very_low.label: Misaligned
very_low.guidance: Want very different things; priorities may clash.

mid.label: Parallel
mid.guidance: Not identical but not in conflict; can coexist.

high.label: Driven Together
high.guidance: Motivate each other; good for shared goals.

very_high.label: Power Pair
very_high.guidance: Big shared drive; potential for major moves.
